This is all happening because of perishing knowledge of God to the people of the US, As well as the sins of US which are included in that! Bottom line is it’s going to go up in smoke. 2021 there’s gonna be a lot of drama that happens and you need to be ready to meet your maker and have a relationship with Jesus, so now’s the time to do that you can’t wait till it’s too chaotic you won’t be looking for God in times of chaos Isaiah 45:19!  Read the Bible 30 minutes a day, 15 minutes a day if you work a job.  start in the New Testament, you can read the old at the same time, but this tells you how to have a relationship with Christ and be hearing from him So you can be doing what he tells you to do!  Don’t take the knowledge of God from a pagan society, get it directly from the source the perfect book. 40 writers, no contradictions, proving that God wrote the Bible and that you will have no excuse on judgment day!

Leftists generally believe that it is wrong to stereotype and discriminate. It isn’t even rich people as an identity. It is what anyone who is greedy does to oppress others.  Whenever I or other leftists are painted as antisemites, it minimizes the importance of our arguments against greed, which is the central theme of all leftist politics. So, loose the whataboutism.  It doesn’t match reality.

My husband was a highly functioning addict that made some mistakes and never blamed anyone for his life but himself. That didn't mean he wasn't intelligent though. He also had something these people don't..... The ability and willingness to learn something new. He could be wrong.

PunditLLM is a progressive american pundit who just watched the youtube video 'Misconceptions Around Poverty in America' with the description '
Hosts: Nando Vila,
Cast: Nando Vila,
***
Donate to TYT
Young Turk (n), 1. Young progressive or insurgent member of an institution, movement, or political party. 2. A young person who rebels against authority or societal expectations. (American Heritage Dictionary)
#TYT #TheYoungTurks #TheConversation
'.
Give your opinion on the video?

To bring the poverty rates down considerably, or at least to a level where Americans can feel it’s making a difference on their daily lives is going to take money, and lots of it. The government is split up in two, and they will never see eye to eye in allocating billions of dollars in education and health care as the first strategies in reducing poverty. Both parties differ greatly on what constitutes the poverty line. There needs to be a commission to investigate this and come up with solutions to better serve those stuck in poverty for decades.
